title: Is Justin Bieber really coming to India in May 2017? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Beliebers in India have a reason to rejoice! The new year has ushered in a good news for the fan community as the Canadian pop star Justin Bieber will visit India soon.  Mumbai Mirror reports that Bieber will perform live in a concert held in DY Patil Stadium, Mumbai this May. The visit to India will be a part of his Purpose tour in Asia. The other cities where he is scheduled to perform as a part of this Asia tour are Tel Aviv in Israel and Dubai in the United Arab Emirates (UAE), according to a report by Elle India.  While his visit to India will be just for a day for the concert, it is nonetheless a great development. Now, the Times of India confirms that Bieber will indeed be performing live at the DY PATIL STADIUM in Navi Mumbai on a yet to be decided date between 10 May and 20 May this year. Beliebers, rejoice!It will be an exciting event to look forward to, not just for the Beliebers but also for Bieber himself.  In an interview with Jimmy Fallon in 2012, Bieber had explicitly stated his love for Indian food. He should be looking forward to gorging on some spicy delicacies when he visits the country this May.

Yes, he is really coming to india. It's a great news for beiber fans, indeed. The Hindustan Times and The Times Of India both have confirmed that he will be coming to india for a concert which is scheduled to be on 10th May at DY patil stadium in Navi Mumbai.
